snippet: A judge said the report, which is said to be critical of New York City’s 911 system, belonged to the taxpayers.
abstract: Justice Arthur F Engoron of State Supreme Court in Manhattan orders Mayor Michael R Bloomberg to release report said to be critical of city's costly, much-delayed emergency dispatch system; cites belief in openness and transparency and says that report was paid for with public money and belongs to New Yorkers.
lead_paragraph: A judge said the report, which is said to be critical of New York City’s 911 system, belonged to the taxpayers.

headline.seo: Judge Orders Release of Report on New York’s 911 System
headline.main: Judge Tells Bloomberg to Release 911 Report
headline.print_headline: Judge Tells Bloomberg To Release 911 Report
